tool.name: datasets
tool.command:
parsec datasets show_dataset "$dataset_id"
#if $deleted: $deleted #end if #if $hda_ldda: --hda_ldda "$hda_ldda" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: deleted
param.label: deleted
param.help: Whether to return results for a deleted dataset

param.name: hda_ldda
param.label: hda_ldda
param.help: Whether to show a history dataset ('hda' - the default) or library dataset ('ldda').

tool.help: Get details about a given dataset. This can be a history or a library dataset.
